messages.subject: Kaze Hikaru
messages.msgSnippet: Kaze Hikaru is great!  I m still trying to read the first few volumes in Japanese. I m so glad it s being translated.
messages.messageBody:
Kaze Hikaru is great! I'm still trying to read the first few volumes
in Japanese. I'm so glad it's being translated.

messages.subject: Kaze Hikaru
messages.msgSnippet: First post here, so I m saying hello. I m trying to find Kaze Hikaru scanlations, but so far it have been difficult. Can you help?
messages.messageBody:
First post here, so I'm saying hello. I'm trying to find 'Kaze Hikaru'
scanlations, but so far it have been difficult.

Can you help?

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Kaze Hikaru
messages.msgSnippet: Actually, I had to naviagte over to their MIRC site to download them there =/ I have chapters 1-6 if anyone wants to host them? ... From: Tiffany To:
messages.messageBody:
Actually, I had to naviagte over to their MIRC site to download them there =/

I have chapters 1-6 if anyone wants to host them?


----- Original Message -----
From: Tiffany
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 09, 2004 1:34 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Re: Kaze Hikaru


I went to the site and got totally lost...still looking for the
translations...seeing the Shinsengumi depicted as "children" will take
a while to get used to ^_^

>
